main event: A visual observation of a standing flash or light was reported over Baffin Island in Canada.
interesting points: The observation occurred at 11:53 AM on an unspecified date., The object was described as a bright light that lasted approximately 3 seconds., The report comments that the description is typical of meteors., There were conclusions suggesting the object could have been a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon., The observation was categorized as ground-visual and involved only one confirmed object.
